ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sachin Patel has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. During his last employment he was working as an ETL /Informatica Developer at Merrill Lynch. Sachin has extensive knowledge of ETL, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, Oracle PL/SQL, Teradata, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, DB2, SQL, Microsoft Excel, UNIX, Oracle 9i, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Informatica, shell scripting, SQLPlus, Oracle 10G, TOAD, Sybase, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, Stored Procedures, SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server Integration Services, Router, Regression Testing, Oracle Toad, Oracle 11g, Microsoft Transact-SQL, MS-Excel XP, Informatica Analytics Package, Flat Files, ETL methodology, Data Transformation Services, Data Migration, COBOL. So far Sachin has not gained any managerial experience.
